body_html:
BTW, when I did the search online yesterday, I found this repository is very helpful.
https://github.com/mind/wheels

I can use a whl file from the repo, and the problem was solved. Refer this link to folks who have the same problem with running Tensorflow in CUDA 9.1

body:
BTW, when I did the search online yesterday, I found this repository is very helpful.
https://github.com/mind/wheels

I can use a whl file from the repo, and the problem was solved. Refer this link to folks who have the same problem with running Tensorflow in CUDA 9.1
